chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.

items.text: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
items.plainText: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.

items.text: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
items.plainText: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

items.text: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
items.plainText: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.

items.text: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
items.plainText: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

items.text: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
items.plainText: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.

items.text: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.
items.plainText: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.

items.text: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.
items.plainText: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.

items.text: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.
items.plainText: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.

items.text: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
items.plainText: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
